Event Details

Step into the ultimate Hand & Brain edition of Chess & Cheers at Uru Brewery! This event celebrates teamwork, creativity, and quick thinking like never before! In this special format, one partner becomes the “Brain,” calling out the type of piece to move, while the other, the “Hand,” brings the strategy to life on the board. It’s a game of trust, laughter, and surprises, where collaboration is the key to victory.

Special Pair Offer: Come as a mixed pair (one male, one female) and get a ₹200 discount on your total entry fee!

Please Note: The discount is only applicable if your team consists of one male and one female. If the pair is not mixed, the discount will not be valid.
